moduleMetadataJson.name: Firefox XPCOM Execute Command
moduleMetadataJson.description:
This module runs a shell command on the target OS without touching the disk.
        On Windows, this command will flash the command prompt momentarily.
        This can be avoided by setting WSCRIPT to true, which drops a jscript
        "launcher" to disk that hides the prompt.
author: joev <joev@metasploit.com>

options.name: WORKSPACE
options.description: Specify the workspace for this module

options.name: JsObfuscate
options.description: Number of times to obfuscate JavaScript

options.name: WSCRIPT
options.description: On Windows, drop a vbscript to hide the cmd prompt
